definition: to wait for an opportunity/(electronic devices) standby
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Once pairing is successful, bracelet is under stand-by mode.
sentences.chinese: 連接成功後，手鐲是在待機模式。

sentences.english: Bug with phone is not avaliable in Zune while syncing & phone goes stand by is ALSO FIXED!
sentences.chinese: 同步時，手機進入待機模式，不會有錯誤信息出現。

sentences.english: Automatically updates slowly, water power-saving devices.
sentences.chinese: 自動待機慢轉，省水省電裝置。

sentences.english: Wake up from standby possible only vian electricing key.
sentences.chinese: 待機下唯有掛機鍵可喚醒設備。

sentences.english: Wake up from standby possible only vian influence key.
sentences.chinese: 待機下只有掛機鍵可喚醒設備。

sentences.english: But he complains that the battery life is short.
sentences.chinese: 但他抱怨說，電池的待機時間太短。

sentences.english: Don't leave your computer or TV on stand -by overnight.
sentences.chinese: 別讓你的電腦或電視機整夜處於待機狀態。

sentences.english: Otherwise, this aborts the ISO operation and the part returns to standby state.
sentences.chinese: 否則，這將會中斷標準操作並使器件返回待機狀態。

sentences.english: To geta responsive and versatile animation controller — covering a wide range ofmovements — we need a set of animations moving in different directions.
sentences.chinese: 第三步，我們要給待機節點添加一個待機動畫。

sentences.english: To geta responsive and versatile animation controller — covering a wide range ofmovements — we need a set of animations moving in different directions.
sentences.chinese: 第三步，我們要給待機節點添加一個待機動畫。

sentences.english: His brother knew how to play a waiting game.
sentences.chinese: 他兄弟懂得如何待機而動。

sentences.english: The standby input power should no more than 3W under the rated input voltage condition.
sentences.chinese: 在額定電壓輸入情況下，待機功耗不大於3W。

sentences.english: Vibrating alert , games , long standby time , walkie - talkie.
sentences.chinese: 振動提示，遊戲，待機時間長，步話機。

sentences.english: He has also converted what is normally the sleep button to a giant power switch.
sentences.chinese: 除此之外，他還把待機鍵改裝成一個大型電源開關。

sentences.english: Standby time is even less relevant.
sentences.chinese: 待機時間就更不重要了。

definition: to recharge (a battery)/(fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure)/to update one's skills and knowledge
to kill two birds with one stone (idiom)
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against
